© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
360 performance analysis
1
Developed a comprehensive reporting suite to enable visibility into all facets of the 
business encompassing market share capture, financial performance and 
operational efficiency
Industrial staffing company

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking to develop a comprehensive reporting suite providing 360 overview across all key aspects of the business 
including the market share trends, financial and operational performance (both supply and demand). Currently, you have no 
visibility into the holistic performance of the organization leading to reactive decision-making hindering market competitiveness, 
resulting in a 2% market share decline over the prior 3 years.
Industrial staffing company needs 360 performance analysis
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have provided enhanced visibility into low and high opportunity markets, enabling to strategically visualize the current 
performance in specific markets, facilitating identification of areas of improvement and growth opportunities
•
You have  enabled in identifying untapped potential revenue opportunity of $2.7 Billion over a three-year period
•
Facilitated the Market leaders to strategize long-term as well as short-term goals based on market potential and operational 
ROI, to enable profitable growth to re-capture the market share decline
360 PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS
KEY RESULT   
•
Revenue opportunity of 
$2.7 Billion over a 
three-year period
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to develop a comprehensive reporting suite to enable visibility into all facets of the business 
encompassing market share capture, financial performance and operational efficiency, including:
1) Collaborating with multiple stakeholders from diverse business functions to achieve alignment on the primary metrics 
for each function, along with defining corresponding logical parameters
2) Developing an integrated data model that consolidates  information from all functional areas as well as third-party 
sources consisting data of market employment and forecasted demand for labor
3) Conceptualizing and developing a robust reporting suite to present a holistic view of business performance across the 
organization

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Collaborated with multiple stakeholders from diverse business functions to achieve alignment on the primary metrics for each function, along with defining 
corresponding logical parameters
•
Developed an integrated data model that consolidates  information from all functional areas as well as third-party sources consisting data of market 
employment and forecasted demand for labor
•
Conceptualized and developed a robust reporting suite to present a holistic view of business performance across the organization
Situation
•
The client lacked visibility into the holistic performance of the organization leading to reactive decision-making hindering market competitiveness, 
resulting in a 2% market share decline over the prior 3 years
•
Partnered with the client to develop a comprehensive reporting suite providing 360 overview across all key aspects of the business including the market 
share trends, financial and operational performance (both supply and demand).
360 performance dashboard for industrial staffing provider
3
Impact
•
Provided enhanced visibility into low and high opportunity markets, enabling the client to strategically visualize the current performance in specific markets, 
facilitating identification of areas of improvement and growth opportunities
•
Enabled the client in identifying untapped potential revenue opportunity of $2.7 Billion over a three-year period
•
Facilitated the Market leaders to strategize long-term as well as short-term goals based on market potential and operational ROI, to enable profitable growth 
to re-capture the market share decline
